id: <string> a unique identifier for the ProductFootprint, if not present then null
specVersion: <string> the version of the specification, if not present then null
version: <integer> the version number of the ProductFootprint, if not present then null
created: <string> the creation timestamp of the ProductFootprint, if not present then null
status: <string> the status of the ProductFootprint, if not present then null
validityPeriodStart: <string> the start of the validity period, if not present then null
validityPeriodEnd: <string> the end of the validity period, if not present then null
companyName: <string> the name of the company, if not present then null
companyIds: <string> the unique identifiers for the company, if not present then null
productDescription: <string> the description of the product, if not present then null
productIds: <string> the unique identifiers for the product, if not present then null
productCategoryCpc: <string> the CPC category of the product, if not present then null
productNameCompany: <string> the company's name for the product, if not present then null
comment: <string> any additional comments, if not present then null

pcf.declaredUnit: <string> the declared unit of the product, if not present then null
pcf.unitaryProductAmount: <string> the amount of product per declared unit, if not present then null
pcf.pCfExcludingBiogenic: <string> the PCF excluding biogenic emissions, if not present then null
pcf.pCfIncludingBiogenic: <string> the PCF including biogenic emissions, if not present then null
pcf.fossilGhgEmissions: <string> the fossil GHG emissions, if not present then null
pcf.fossilCarbonContent: <string> the fossil carbon content, if not present then null
pcf.biogenicCarbonContent: <string> the biogenic carbon content, if not present then null
pcf.dLucGhgEmissions: <string> the direct land-use change GHG emissions, if not present then null
pcf.landManagementGhgEmissions: <string> the land management GHG emissions, if not present then null
pcf.otherBiogenicGhgEmissions: <string> the other biogenic GHG emissions, if not present then null
pcf.iLucGhgEmissions: <string> the indirect land-use change GHG emissions, if not present then null
pcf.biogenicCarbonWithdrawal: <string> the biogenic carbon withdrawal, if not present then null
pcf.aircraftGhgEmissions: <string> the aircraft GHG emissions, if not present then null
pcf.characterizationFactors: <string> the characterization factors, if not present then null
ipccCharacterizationFactorsSources: <string> the sources of IPCC characterization factors, if not present then null
crossSectoralStandardsUsed: <string> the cross-sectoral standards used, if not present then null

productOrSectorSpecificRules.operator: <string> the operator of the rule, if not present then null
ruleNames: <string> the names of the rules, if not present then null
productOrSectorSpecificRules.otherOperatorName: <string> the name of the other operator, if not present then null

pcf.biogenicAccountingMethodology: <string> the biogenic accounting methodology, if not present then null
pcf.boundaryProcessesDescription: <string> the description of boundary processes, if not present then null
pcf.referencePeriodStart: <string> the start of the reference period, if not present then null
pcf.referencePeriodEnd: <string> the end of the reference period, if not present then null

geographicScope.geographyRegionOrSubregion: <string> the geography region or subregion, if not present then null

secondaryEmissionFactorSources.name: <string> the name of the secondary emission factor source, if not present then null
secondaryEmissionFactorSources.version: <string> the version of the secondary emission factor source, if not present then null

pcf.exemptedEmissionsPercent: <integer> the percentage of exempted emissions, if not present then null
pcf.exemptedEmissionsDescription: <string> the description of exempted emissions, if not present then null
pcf.packagingEmissionsIncluded: <boolean> whether packaging emissions are included, if not present then null
pcf.allocationRulesDescription: <string> the description of allocation rules, if not present then null
pcf.uncertaintyAssessmentDescription: <string> the description of uncertainty assessment, if not present then null
pcf.primaryDataShare: <float> the share of primary data, if not present then null

dqi.coveragePercent: <integer> the percentage coverage of data quality indicators, if not present then null
dqi.technologicalDQR: <float> the technological data quality rating, if not present then null
dqi.temporalDQR: <float> the temporal data quality rating, if not present then null
dqi.geographicalDQR: <float> the geographical data quality rating, if not present then null
dqi.completenessDQR: <float> the completeness data quality rating, if not present then null
dqi.reliabilityDQR: <float> the reliability data quality rating, if not present then null

assurance.assurance: <boolean> whether assurance is provided, if not present then null
assurance.providerName: <string> the name of the assurance provider, if not present then null
